channel.title: Help plz
channel.description: Hi when i go into characters when i click save for the name fo the cahracter i want to make a mod he doesnt become a mod can some make a lil tut on how to exactally make a mod on this server please. thanks[br][size=1]Posted at: August 21, 2006, 11:02:39 PM[/size][hr]help? please lol

item.title: Help plz
item.dc:creator: @Toedion Toedion
item.description:
@Toedion wrote:

[quote=“sirholkms, post:2, topic:10548”]Go to client.java and press Cnt+F and copy and paste in:
//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

You should see some thing like this:
//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Some thing here”))

Change that to:
//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Put the name of your player here”))

And change put the name of your player here to the name of your player lol and save and compile and your done. I hope that helps. Oh and when you are admin you can’t see the crown next to your name but other people can. You better be using a testscape based source or this was for nothing!!![/quote]

Thanks soo much

Read full topic

item.title: Help plz
item.dc:creator: @sirholkms sirholkms
item.description:
@sirholkms wrote:

Go to client.java and press Cnt+F and copy and paste in:
//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

You should see some thing like this:
//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Some thing here”))

Change that to:
//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Put the name of your player here”))

And change put the name of your player here to the name of your player lol and save and compile and your done. I hope that helps. Oh and when you are admin you can’t see the crown next to your name but other people can. You better be using a testscape based source or this was for nothing!!!

Read full topic
